cast.name: 约翰·布罗特顿 John Brotherton

introduction: 加州演员梦展现了五个独一无二的人对生活梦想的追求。这部电影通过设立在南加利福尼亚州的小城镇里的试镜，刻画了真实的人物，他们怀有成为好莱坞演员的愿望，但由于种种原因，机遇从未降临到他们身上。无论最后的结果是什么，是名声，爱情，还是短暂拍摄的永恒瞬间，这部有趣的电影揭示了好莱坞以某种奇怪的形式或方式对大家施加的奇怪和令人难以置信的催眠手段。California Dreams presents five unique individuals in pursuit of a big life dream. Through auditions set up in small towns across Southern California, the film portrays real people with big Hollywood aspirations who, for various reasons, have never had the opportunity to pursue them. No matter what the end game is, whether it's fame, love, or a fleeting shot at immortality, this bitingly funny film reveals the strange and entrancingly hypnotic grip that Hollywood has exerted, in some way or form, on everyone.
